name: Anse Major Passage
description: Afternoon glare transforms Anse Major's coastal footpath into a ribbon of white light as a weathered pirate hauls the corner of a treasure chest along the granite trail. A witch marks an 'X' on the stone slab while a black cat watches with unblinking green eyes. Two rope coils lie nearby, two cat eyes gleam—the double count leads to bearing 222 degrees, where mathematics and mysticism converge. Bearing 222°. Cipher output: GA. "Two coils, two eyes; follow the double."
riddle: Two coils, two eyes; follow the double.
